name: Metronome (cpcf)
description:
A ball bounces from side to side, hit it before it leaves the screen to score a point!

Get the source code here: https://github.com/cpcf/metronome-gb

Controls

Start Game:  Start

Left-Hit:   D-Pad Left

Right-Hit:  A

Developers Notes

This game was a simple project for me to learn some Game Boy ASM development basics, the scope is tiny and the code is likely very poorly optimised.
